thread.title_full: Convenient to the Excel and DLR train and very comfortable. - Review of Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: orchy1962
title: Convenient to the Excel and DLR train and very comfortable.
text: The hotel is really convenient to the Excel and DLR train station (all within easy walking distance). Check in and out with ease. They have a good variety of evening meal choices, my fish & chips were delicious. The staff were very welcoming and attentive in all areas, the free wifi worked well and it's speed was more than adequate for my purposes.
